title: "Artificial intelligence detects fractures on CT images for osteoporosis diagnostics"
excerpt: "The bone density of many people decreases as they get older. This process, which is known as osteoporosis, often goes unnoticed, even if there are fractures to the vertebral bodies. These fractures could be detected by means of X-rays or computed tomography (CT),"
